page.title: 15Sonya in Cottesmore
page.content: Wednesday 3rd July I woke up in my bed.My bed is made of pine.A mattress goes over the bit where I sleep and a sheet goes over the mattress.A quilt covers me and my head rests on a pillow.I had my breakfast.Then at 8.45 I went to school.At 11.55 we went downstairs to wash our hands for lunch.After lunch we had sportsday.I was in three races.I liked the obstacle race best.After sports we went in to change.Later that day we were talking about sportsday whilst we were having tea.For tea we were having salad, pork pie and ham.Then I had to go upstairs to run the bath.After we had washed ourselves we got out of the bath and got dried. I put on my night dress then I got into bed and said my prayers.Then I fell asleep.
